title: Practice-Linked Blended Language E-Learning Course: Strengthening Industry-Applicable Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and fundamental job-related knowledge
context.additional_context: Learners primarily access content via smartphones and must focus on acquiring language skills required in actual industrial settings. Learning outcomes are measured through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use over 10 industry-specific technical terms relevant to practical workplace scenarios.
Learners can complete language project assignments by collaborating with peers at least twice a week using an LMS and mobile devices.
Learners can write workplace documents (e.g., emails, reports) required in real-world professional environments with accurate grammar.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
